attributes.action: Abandon the Proposed ID Card Scheme In Light of Recent Loss of Child Benefit Data
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the evident lack of security measures to protect a citizen's personal data, such that a 'junior level' department employee (a) Has access to the information and (b) Can choose to send by internal mail without any record of delivery. There can be no guarantee that the detailed information required for the issue of an ID card will be kept secure. Therefore given the risk to each citizen's data the ID card scheme should be abandoned.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
